summary: This module implements a database migration that transforms ODMantic reference fields into standardized Beanie Link objects for the upgrade from version 0.7.0 to 0.8.0. It provides helper utilities to perform the conversion across various entity models and includes a component for managing image metadata and linking images to application variants.
business_intent: To maintain data integrity and compatibility after a version upgrade by updating stored references to the new Link format, ensuring that related records and image assets are correctly linked within the database.
